instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165 short on VCORE
threads.message:
Liquid damage on big caps PPBUS_S5HS_COMPUTING_ISNS - no of them are short.

Got light on charger and short on PPVCC_S0_CPU?

PPVCC_S0_CPU:
24 Ohms resistance to ground
0.015V diade mode

Any hope?

threads.title: 820-00165 short on VCORE
threads.message:
There is no short, just low value; and is normal for VCORE.

Post some basic voltages and signals from Power On Sequence.

threads.title: 820-00165 short on VCORE
threads.message:
PPBUS_G3H - 8.56V
PPBUS_S5_HS_COMPUTING_ISNS - 8.58V
PPBUS_S5_HS_OTHER_ISNS - 8.59V
PP3V42_G3H - 3.40V
PPVRTC_G3H - 3.30V
PP5V_S5 - 5.0V
PP5V_S4RS3 - 0V
PP3V3_S5 - 3.30V
PP3V3_S4 - 0V

S4_PWR_EN - 0V
PM_SLP_S5_L - 0V

And I am lost...

threads.title: 820-00165 short on VCORE
threads.message: Sorted - there was short on PP3v3_S0
